Subject: Procedure for migrating from Ubuntu 14.04 LTS to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Virtual Appliance
Description: Hello. What's the procedure from upgrading from the virtual appliance based on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS which is EOL to the one based on Ubuntu 22.04?
What_We_Know__c:
Connected remote to the client's computer and performed the import of the backup through SQL (procedure 1) to the new server.
Tested afterwards on the new server and everything seemed to be in place.
Solution_Comment__c: Client confirmed the issue has been sorted.
